It is revealed to be Demon King Rance's fortress."},{"lineNumber":193303,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　魔人サテラ、ホーネット、シルキィ、サイゼル、ハウゼル、ワーグ、レイ、","translatedEnglishLine":"        Demon Satera, Hornet, Silky, Saizel, Housel, Warg, Rey,"},{"lineNumber":193304,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　魔物大元帥学者と数百の魔物を率いて魔王ランスが現れ、世界に新魔王軍を宣言。","translatedEnglishLine":"        accompanied by the demon grand marshal scholar and hundreds of demons, Demon King Rance appears and proclaims the New Demon King Army to the world."},{"lineNumber":193305,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":193306,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　人類各国、魔物の有力者が、魔王ランスへ謁見を求める。","translatedEnglishLine":"        Various human nations and influential demons seek audience with Demon King Rance."},{"lineNumber":193307,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　純粋にランスに会いたい者――","translatedEnglishLine":"        Those who purely wish to meet Rance—"},{"lineNumber":193308,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　魔王に忠誠を誓い臣下になりたい者――","translatedEnglishLine":"        Those who want to swear loyalty and become subordinates to the Demon King—"},{"lineNumber":193309,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　魔王の力を利用しようとする者――","translatedEnglishLine":"        Those who seek to use the Demon King's power—"},{"lineNumber":193310,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　しかし、誰一人として魔王に謁見出来た者はいなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"        However, no one was able to gain an audience with the Demon King."},{"lineNumber":193311,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍、人類共に複数の勢力、国家が存在し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both the demon army and humanity consist of multiple factions and nations,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 互いに勢力を競い合うこととなってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which have come to compete against each other for power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、幸いなことに戦争にまでは至っていない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, fortunately, it has not escalated to war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは何故か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why is that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 父が気まぐれに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because my father whimsically

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっちこっちを攻めるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: attacks here and there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこも戦争する余裕がないのだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no one else has the capacity to wage war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……魔王になって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Having become the Demon King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人様にかける迷惑のレベルが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel the level of trouble I cause to others

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 段違いになってしまった気もする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has become vastly different.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 考えようによってはこの世界は、父のおかげで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you think about it, this world, thanks to my father,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 束の間の平和を享受出来ているとも言える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can be said to be enjoying a momentary peace.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう、あくまでも――束の間の平和。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, after all — a fleeting peace.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 父による各国の被害は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The damage my father causes to each country

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ数年で徐々に増えつつあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has been gradually increasing over the last few years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五年前の人類連合軍と魔王との戦争で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The war between the United Human Forces and the Demon King five years ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか落ち着かせることは出来たが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was somehow settled, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――魔王の血。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —The blood of the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それこそが全ての元凶。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is the root cause of everything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王になった者を無条件に凶暴化させ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It unconditionally makes those who become Demon Kings violent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破壊衝動に駆り立てる存在。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and drives them with destructive impulses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままでは、いずれ父は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If things continue like this, eventually my father will...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は自分の手を青空にかざす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I raise my hand toward the blue sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この手は、いつか父に届かなくなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someday, this hand will no longer reach my father.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、その前に――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, before that happens—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この手をまた、父に届かせなければ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I must make this hand reach my father again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＬＰ８年にしてＲＡ０年
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: LP Year 8 / RA Year 0

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第二次魔人戦争、終結
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: End of the Second Demon War

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス総統閣下率いる人類軍と魔人ケイブリス率いる魔軍との戦いは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle between the human forces led by Supreme Commander Rance and the demon army led by the demon Kayblis,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数々の奇跡が重なり、人類軍の勝利で終結を迎える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ended in victory for the human forces due to a series of miracles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新たな魔王の誕生
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Birth of a New Demon King

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王に覚醒しかけた来水美樹からランスが己へ魔王の血を移し替え魔王に就任。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, to prevent Mikki Kisaragi from awakening as the Demon King, transferred the Demon King's blood to himself and assumed the title.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正気を保ったままで魔物達に対し、人類圏への不可侵を命じる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While retaining his sanity, he ordered the demons not to invade human territories.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の力で健太郎から魔血魂を摘出、健太郎が人間に戻る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Using his Demon King powers, Rance extracted the demon blood soul from Kentarou, restoring him to a human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスのその後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happened to Demon King Rance afterwards

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王となった次の日、ランスは魔人サテラと共に忽然と姿を消した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The day after becoming Demon King, Rance suddenly disappeared along with the demon Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主であるランス不在のまま死亡したシィルの葬儀がしめやかに行われる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The funeral of Siil, who died in Rance's absence, was held quietly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴隷としては異例の参列者の数となり、多くの者が故人の死を悼んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An unusually large number of attendees for a slave mourned the deceased.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王リトルプリンセスのその後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happened to Demon King Little Princess afterwards

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い間異世界を冒険した美樹と健太郎の二人は皆に見送られて故郷へ帰還する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mikki and Kentarou, who had adventured in another world for a long time, were sent off by everyone and returned home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＲＡ１年
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: RA Year 1

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランス時代が始まる。年号がＲＡ歴となる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The era of Demon King Rance begins. The year system changes to RA calendar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新魔王軍結成
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Formation of the New Demon King Army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山の頂上付近にて城の建設が始まる。魔王ランスの居城と判明。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Construction of a castle begins near the summit of Mount Shoryu. It is revealed to be Demon King Rance's fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サテラ、ホーネット、シルキィ、サイゼル、ハウゼル、ワーグ、レイ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Satera, Hornet, Silky, Saizel, Housel, Warg, Rey,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大元帥学者と数百の魔物を率いて魔王ランスが現れ、世界に新魔王軍を宣言。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: accompanied by the demon grand marshal scholar and hundreds of demons, Demon King Rance appears and proclaims the New Demon King Army to the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類各国、魔物の有力者が、魔王ランスへ謁見を求める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Various human nations and influential demons seek audience with Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 純粋にランスに会いたい者――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who purely wish to meet Rance—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王に忠誠を誓い臣下になりたい者――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who want to swear loyalty and become subordinates to the Demon King—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の力を利用しようとする者――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who seek to use the Demon King's power—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、誰一人として魔王に謁見出来た者はいなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, no one was able to gain an audience with the Demon King.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

in another world for a long time, were sent off by everyone and returned home."},{"lineNumber":193298,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＲＡ１年","translatedEnglishLine":"RA Year The year system changes to RA calendar."},{"lineNumber":193300,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":193301,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　新魔王軍結成","translatedEnglishLine":"    Formation of the New Demon King Army"},{"lineNumber":193302,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　翔竜山の頂上付近にて城の建設が始まる。魔王ランスの居城と判明。","translatedEnglishLine":"        Construction of a castle begins near the summit of Mount Shoryu. It is revealed to be Demon King Rance's fortress."},{"lineNumber":193303,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　魔人サテラ、ホーネット、シルキィ、サイゼル、ハウゼル、ワーグ、レイ、","translatedEnglishLine":"        Demon Satera, Hornet, Silky, Saizel, Housel, Warg, Rey,"},{"lineNumber":193304,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　魔物大元帥学者と数百の魔物を率いて魔王ランスが現れ、世界に新魔王軍を宣言。","translatedEnglishLine":"        accompanied by the demon grand marshal scholar and hundreds of demons, Demon King Rance appears and proclaims the New Demon King Army to the world."},{"lineNumber":193305,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":193306,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　人類各国、魔物の有力者が、魔王ランスへ謁見を求める。","translatedEnglishLine":"        Various human nations and influential demons seek audience with Demon King Rance."},{"lineNumber":193307,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　純粋にランスに会いたい者――","translatedEnglishLine":"        Those who purely wish to meet Rance—"},{"lineNumber":193308,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　魔王に忠誠を誓い臣下になりたい者――","translatedEnglishLine":"        Those who want to swear loyalty and become subordinates to the Demon King—"},{"lineNumber":193309,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　魔王の力を利用しようとする者――","translatedEnglishLine":"        Those who seek to use the Demon King's power—"},{"lineNumber":193310,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　しかし、誰一人として魔王に謁見出来た者はいなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"        However, no one was able to gain an audience with the Demon King."},{"lineNumber":193311,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍、人類共に複数の勢力、国家が存在し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both the demon army and humanity consist of multiple factions and nations,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 互いに勢力を競い合うこととなってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which have come to compete against each other for power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、幸いなことに戦争にまでは至っていない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, fortunately, it has not escalated to war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは何故か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why is that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 父が気まぐれに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because my father whimsically

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっちこっちを攻めるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: attacks here and there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこも戦争する余裕がないのだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no one else has the capacity to wage war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……魔王になって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Having become the Demon King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人様にかける迷惑のレベルが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel the level of trouble I cause to others

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 段違いになってしまった気もする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has become vastly different.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 考えようによってはこの世界は、父のおかげで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you think about it, this world, thanks to my father,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 束の間の平和を享受出来ているとも言える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can be said to be enjoying a momentary peace.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう、あくまでも――束の間の平和。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, after all — a fleeting peace.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 父による各国の被害は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The damage my father causes to each country

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ数年で徐々に増えつつあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has been gradually increasing over the last few years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五年前の人類連合軍と魔王との戦争で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The war between the United Human Forces and the Demon King five years ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか落ち着かせることは出来たが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was somehow settled, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――魔王の血。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —The blood of the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それこそが全ての元凶。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is the root cause of everything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王になった者を無条件に凶暴化させ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It unconditionally makes those who become Demon Kings violent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破壊衝動に駆り立てる存在。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and drives them with destructive impulses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままでは、いずれ父は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If things continue like this, eventually my father will...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は自分の手を青空にかざす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I raise my hand toward the blue sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この手は、いつか父に届かなくなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someday, this hand will no longer reach my father.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、その前に――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, before that happens—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この手をまた、父に届かせなければ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I must make this hand reach my father again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＬＰ８年にしてＲＡ０年
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: LP Year 8 / RA Year 0

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第二次魔人戦争、終結
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: End of the Second Demon War

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス総統閣下率いる人類軍と魔人ケイブリス率いる魔軍との戦いは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle between the human forces led by Supreme Commander Rance and the demon army led by the demon Kayblis,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数々の奇跡が重なり、人類軍の勝利で終結を迎える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ended in victory for the human forces due to a series of miracles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新たな魔王の誕生
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Birth of a New Demon King

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王に覚醒しかけた来水美樹からランスが己へ魔王の血を移し替え魔王に就任。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, to prevent Mikki Kisaragi from awakening as the Demon King, transferred the Demon King's blood to himself and assumed the title.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正気を保ったままで魔物達に対し、人類圏への不可侵を命じる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While retaining his sanity, he ordered the demons not to invade human territories.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の力で健太郎から魔血魂を摘出、健太郎が人間に戻る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Using his Demon King powers, Rance extracted the demon blood soul from Kentarou, restoring him to a human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスのその後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happened to Demon King Rance afterwards

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王となった次の日、ランスは魔人サテラと共に忽然と姿を消した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The day after becoming Demon King, Rance suddenly disappeared along with the demon Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主であるランス不在のまま死亡したシィルの葬儀がしめやかに行われる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The funeral of Siil, who died in Rance's absence, was held quietly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴隷としては異例の参列者の数となり、多くの者が故人の死を悼んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An unusually large number of attendees for a slave mourned the deceased.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王リトルプリンセスのその後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happened to Demon King Little Princess afterwards

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い間異世界を冒険した美樹と健太郎の二人は皆に見送られて故郷へ帰還する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mikki and Kentarou, who had adventured in another world for a long time, were sent off by everyone and returned home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＲＡ１年
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: RA Year 1

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランス時代が始まる。年号がＲＡ歴となる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The era of Demon King Rance begins. The year system changes to RA calendar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新魔王軍結成
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Formation of the New Demon King Army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山の頂上付近にて城の建設が始まる。魔王ランスの居城と判明。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Construction of a castle begins near the summit of Mount Shoryu. It is revealed to be Demon King Rance's fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サテラ、ホーネット、シルキィ、サイゼル、ハウゼル、ワーグ、レイ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Satera, Hornet, Silky, Saizel, Housel, Warg, Rey,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大元帥学者と数百の魔物を率いて魔王ランスが現れ、世界に新魔王軍を宣言。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: accompanied by the demon grand marshal scholar and hundreds of demons, Demon King Rance appears and proclaims the New Demon King Army to the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類各国、魔物の有力者が、魔王ランスへ謁見を求める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Various human nations and influential demons seek audience with Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 純粋にランスに会いたい者――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who purely wish to meet Rance—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王に忠誠を誓い臣下になりたい者――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who want to swear loyalty and become subordinates to the Demon King—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の力を利用しようとする者――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who seek to use the Demon King's power—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、誰一人として魔王に謁見出来た者はいなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, no one was able to gain an audience with the Demon King.
